body:
Unable to start Minecraft Runtime Environment. This is most likely caused by a corruption. Please try to reinstall Minecraft.

When trying to start up Minecraft. Already tried reinstalling, still the same.
Any ideas how to fix?
body_tagged:
Unable to start Minecraft Runtime Environment. This is most likely caused by a corruption. Please try to reinstall Minecraft.

When trying to start up Minecraft. Already tried reinstalling, still the same.
Any ideas how to fix?
title: Runtime Environment Help?

replies.body: reinstall java, allocate different amounts of ram to MC or maybe system restore to the time when your minecraft was working (back everything up before doing it)
replies.body_tagged: reinstall java, allocate different amounts of ram to MC or maybe system restore to the time when your minecraft was working (back everything up before doing it)

replies.body: did it the crash begin when u installed a new texture pack?
replies.body_tagged: did it the crash begin when u installed a new texture pack?

replies.body: Have you done anything recently to any of your profiles?
replies.body_tagged: Have you done anything recently to any of your profiles?

replies.body:
Thanks to all, problem has been solved.

Just had to reinstall Java
